Key Match Events: The Knicks won against the Washington Wizards for the second straight game in Capital One Arena, Washington D.C.
Karl-Anthony Towns led all scorers in the game and registered another double-double performance with 32 points and 13 rebounds
Pre-Game Insights: The Knicks registered their season-best eighth consecutive win on Monday
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks improved to 23-10 and are now 0.5 games behind the defending champion Boston Celtics for second place in the Eastern Conference
Miscellaneous Highlights: Karl-Anthony Towns has four 30-point games, including Monday's victory at the nation's capital, during the Knicks' current eight-game winning streak
Jalen Brunson added 18 points on Monday after scoring a season-high 55 points on Saturday
Others: Karl-Anthony Towns and his girlfriend, Jordyn Woods, visited the White House after the Knicks' close win on Saturday
